name: My Evil Bird
description:
Congratulations! You have been selected to help creepy robe guy take care of Lawrence, his (evil) pet bird!

(This game is currently in early alpha  so a lot of features have not been added yet & not all art is finalized)

Features:

  • Every time you play you may get 1 of 2 backgrounds (more will be added)
  • There no real win yet but keeping Lawrence alive counts as a win in my book!
  • There is currently 1 hidden text in the game (can you find it?)
  • You'll probably find a bug or two (not intentional)

How to play:

In case you don't look at the instruction pages within game or wanted to know beforehand.

You play the game mainly with your mouse by clicking  buttons to fill Lawrence's meters and you can pause/un-pause the game using P

Bugs I currently know: (If you find anymore please let me know)

  • Lawrence will sometimes not die again if game is played again without closing the game first.

Noticed: 

I have something very interesting  plan for this game so stay connected  my digital friends either on here or over on my twitter! Where you can see snippets of what's to come or just me yelling/complaining about programming  nightmares.
